description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies a template with a text element that updates based on component state, manages internal state for favorite toggling, and handles input to change the state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button with toggle functionality for favoriting.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
